page.title: 05Ghosts at Rycote Chapel
page.content: Rycote Chapel is a medieval chapel, currently maintained by the Department of the Environment. In it's more recent history it has been revisited by some of those involved in the chapel's illustrious past! At about 6 o'clock on December 16th 1973, Mr Morris,the custodian of the chapel at the time,saw a lady in shining grey.He thought it was someone in fancy dress or perhaps someone being filmed for television.He went to investigate and saw her walk straight into his office and out of the other side,he also realised that HE had walked straight through this unusual figure.He tried to follow her but round the next corner she flickered and vanished.One theory is that this was the ghost of Lady Cecily Heron,daughter of Thomas More.Another ghost recently reported was that of The Milk Maid.
